post.body: kanter who stole your content?
would love to read some of your stuff. You have anything posted online?
Comcast sucks it all. If there's ever a time I can take them out I will. :-)
keep it moving son, what's on your play list?
DJ platurn just put out a docu on visiting his homeland of iceland. Let me know if you want to see.
oh shit let me know when you guys have your first show son! I'm there!
wow it was that bad?
what band you join son?
going to send email now
I was simply amazing listening to Bill T. Jones today. An amazingly authentic guy. A true artist + independent!
If U have not seen the HBO doc, The Black List U R rlly missing out. The film was made by Free Mind Ventures a top indie company.
It's a moral imperative to have a clear view of who you are without that picture being skewed by the world!
What's up with girls? Take responsibilty for how you feel. I do........
Finally figured out NYE 2009, gonna have some fun for sure.
What's up to all the indies out there. 2009 is your year.
Has anyone else been staying up all hours of the night working lately. I feel '09 coming and I want a head start! :-)
The convergence is between indie art culture and independent business culture.
The Bigs always trying to take advantage of the indies. Stealing designs, again! http://twurl.nl/wn0hbj
music's your mistress not your girl. Music's a vixen u worry about sneaking out and doing her own thing. Business is the one you bring home.
Debating my new years plans! Weird!
